body.name: Hasuit 6 Drawers Double Dresser, Wooden Dresser with Heavy Sturdy Steel Frame, Large Capacity Storage Chest of Drawers, Black Dresser for Bedroom, Living Room, Entryway
body.stockDetail: Only 17 left in stock - order soon.
features: 【6 Large Storage Drawers】Modern black dresser has 6 big private storage drawers, which can store your clothes, toys, books, or any other personal items. Wide tabletop can place some items within reach. Chest of drawers can also be used as a dresser TV stand, which is great for displaying CDs, DVDs, game controllers, etc. Get this dresser home to store items, and keep your home clean and tidy！ Overall measures 47.3" (W) x 15.8" (D) x 31.3" (H).

【Heavy Metal Structure】 Chest of drawers with sturdy heavy metal frame inside, and the outside, and back is completely wrapped by a thickened MDF board, which greatly enhances the robustness and bearing capacity of the dresser. High-quality MDF wood, which is waterproof, anti-scratch, and easy to clean. More Details：1.Each drawer has a metal slide rail that is easy to pull out. 2. Table legs with foot pads to prevent scratching the floor. 3. Anti-fall device protects you and your family.

【Every Corner Needs It】Modern large capacity 6 drawers double dresser has a sleek look and can be put in any corner of the home to play a role. Use as a dressing table in the bedroom, a nightstand next to the bed, a closet to store clothes, a storage cabinet in the living room, a toy storage cabinet in the nursery or to store take-out items in the entryway. This practical and beautiful cabinet is a great gift for family or friends！

【Classic Style】Add a classic, simple storage solution to your room with the Hasuit black drawer dresser. Modern style of MDF wood grain and metal frame is easy to match with a variety of bedroom styles, highlighting your taste. Use alone or in combination with the Hasuit series.

【Please Contact Hasuit Team】Assemble is required, but don't worry! Hasuit drawer dresser has clear Installation steps, and all parts are individually packed and marked. If you have any problems with assembly and quality, please contact our store's support team first and we’ll give you a solution. Thank you for your support and trust！

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hasuit black 6 drawers double dresser with heavy steel frame for your bedroom Add a classic, simple storage solution for your room with the Hasuit classic black drawer dresser for bedroom. Modern style of MDF wood grain and metal frame is easy to match with a variety of bedroom styles, highlighting your taste. Use alone or in combination with the Hasuit series.

Modern large capacity storage 6 drawers dresser has a sleek look and can be put in any corner of the home to play a role. Black chest of drawers can be used as a dresser TV stand, and be combined with your wall-mounted TV as an entertainment center for your DVDs, record players, and other devices.

Get this dresser home to store items, keep your home clean and tidy！ Modern dresser has 6 large private storage drawers and a wide tabletop. Use it as a dressing table in the bedroom, a nightstand next to the bed, a closet to store clothes, a storage cabinet in the living room, a toy storage cabinet in the nursery or to store take-out items in the entryway, etc.

Heavy Metal Structure The dresser with sturdy heavy metal frame inside, and the outside, back is completely wrapped by a thickened MDF board, which greatly enhances the robustness and bearing capacity of the dresser. The surface is finished with high-quality MDF wood, which is waterproof, anti-scratch, and easy to clean.

Details Reflect Quality 1. Each drawer uses high-quality metal slides to slide silently to access items. 2. Exquisite round metal handle, easy to pull out. 3. Necessary anti-fall device to protect you and your family. The 4.5 table legs are equipped with adjustable foot pads to prevent shaking and protect your floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love this dresser. It’s nice and sturdy. Pretty good quality. I love the measurements, length height and width. It’s not just some little dresser. It’s nice and big but not overly big.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s a great look, but definitely a difficult assembly
reviews.reviewText: It looks great and the size is really nice, especially since a lot of the dressers I saw on Amazon were kid dressers. On the downside, the assembly was frustrating. Some of the pieces did not fit properly assembling them the way the instructions said to. It took innovative thinking to get the pieces of the actual drawer to fit together correctly. Once it was figured out we got it, but it took foreveeeeerrrrr.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Poor quality, takes decent amount of time to assemble. After i assembled and tried to use it screws coming out because they made them short so you cannot tighten them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, sturdy & end product is great! The seller was really responsive & accommodating to something I thought was missing. And willingly ordered & replaced the piece.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars quality is average
reviews.reviewText: quality is average can get better for same or little more money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dresser but hard to assemble
reviews.reviewText: It's a nice simple dresser but hard to assemble

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Preferred for baby clothes
reviews.reviewText: Very small dresser. Cute but can barely fit anything in there.
